text_block_list.text:
The day of the mock race……More spectators had come 
than I expected. And not just Narita Top Road's friends――

Let's see, how did training go……Oh? Looking a little nervous? 
Well, it's your first race as a pro trainer after all.
text_block_list.name: Sensei

text_block_list.text:
Hahaa, go out there and enjoy it to the fullest! 
I'm expecting great things from you!
text_block_list.name: Sensei
choice_data_list: Don't put more pressure on me……

text_block_list.text:
Hearing encouragement from so far away just seemed to put 
more pressure on me. I took a deep breath to calm myself down.

Since becoming a pro, and since teaming up with 
Narita Top Road, it's my first race. Considering 
that, anything more than that would……

Fufuu. I'm getting really motivated. If they're cheering 
that much for me, then I'll have to show them a good run!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Narita Top Road waved to her friends that came 
to cheer her on with a big smile on her face.
choice_data_list: Narita Top Road, how can you……

text_block_list.text: Yeah?
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: Eh……
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
I had said that out loud without thinking. There was 
already overwhelming pressure on her from so many 
expectations but I might have added another burden.

I was able to keep myself from saying anything more. 
As a trainer, that wasn't the right way to ask her.

No matter how much pressure I was feeling, 
passing on that uneasiness to Narita Top Road was――
I'm completely fine! Besides, I'm happy!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
I think that expectations are like a 
piece of someone's dreams and wishes.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
That they're entrusting their dreams, their 
wishes, their feelings to someone……believing 
that they'll be shown a wonderful scene.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
That they're entrusting something that important, 
to me……that's something amazing, right?
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
――I had never thought of it that way. 
I could feel Narita Top Road's words stir within me.
Trainer-san.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: Will you try having expectations of me?
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Right. That I'll win, 
that I'll cross the goal before anyone else.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: Trainer-san's expectations……will become my strength!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
――Dazzling. That was the only word that came to mind. 
And once again, that feeling of being drawn to her……

Ah, looks like the mock race is starting, huh. 
I'm heading out, Trainer-san! Make sure you're watching me.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: The mock race begins! And they're off!
text_block_list.name: Announcer Uma Musume

text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa, haa……!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
(Yeah, looking good……! 
I'll keep this position……and wait for a chance!)
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: Looking good, looking good, Top Road!
text_block_list.name: Classmate Uma Musume

text_block_list.text: (……cheering. Voices filled with expectations)
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: (Are these a burden for Trainer-san?)
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
(Maybe, for Trainer-san, these words don't push 
them forward, they are something to be carried)
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
(If that's the case then……I want to help lighten 
that burden. Because, even while carrying 
that burden, they still did their best for me)
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
(Will Trainer-san……have any expectations for me? 
Will they think……that I'll definitely win?)
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
(……I can't hear Trainer-san's voice. 
I can't hear it, but……)
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
(But maybe, just maybe……past that corner, 
beyond that……and even further……)
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
choice_data_list: Top Road! The goal's so close!!
Top Road! The goal's so close!!

text_block_list.text: (They're waiting for me……at the goal!!)
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
A voice cried out 『――Do your best, Narita Top Road, 
you can do it, show them the results of your training!』

(Trainer-san……! I want to show you…… 
that I can cross the goal first!)
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: I'll live up to……your expectations!!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: Uwaaaaaaaahhh!!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: And they cross the goaaaaaaal!! First place is――!
text_block_list.name: Announcer Uma Musume

text_block_list.text: I……I pushed too hard……!!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
……things were perfect right up until the halfway point. 
However, even after all that training, she still 
couldn't handle tight corners, unfortunately……

I'm sorry! Even after all that training……but, but next time! 
I'll practice more! As many times as it takes.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
I wasn't able to live up to your expectations this time around, 
but if you give me a little time! Then, I'll be better……!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
I could feel her desperation. 
……But even then.
T-Trainer-san?
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
She seemed to be overflowing with motivation 
and a will to win. Even in this atmosphere…… 
even after losing, she still had this much spirit.
I was frustrated we lost. I was frustrated but……more than that――
! Trainer-san……
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: ……Yeah. I'm really frustrated……but, it was still fun!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Right――I want to see more of her, to have more expectations 
of her. This Uma Musume named Narita Top Road.

It wasn't like the pressure was gone. But now, 
that was slowly turning in to the motivation to move forward.
choice_data_list: I want to run together with you
I want to run together with you

text_block_list.text: Next time, we'll claim victory.
Trainer-san……
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Together with Narita Top Road, G1's wouldn't be just a dream. 
With a big dream like that, I couldn't help but look forward to it.

(……If I'm able to give Trainer-san 
their first G1 victory……What kind of……)
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: (Smile would they show me?)
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
……Yeah! I'll do alot of training! 
I'll overcome my weaknesses, build up strength, and then……!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
I'll definitely win a G1! 
Well……I'll win! I'm looking forward to this!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
